name: Carbogen Amcis - Cholesterol NF
description: Carbogen Amcis offers Cholesterol NF grade meeting United States Pharmacopeia (USP) and National Formulary (NF) standards. This pharmaceutical-grade cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent and moisturizer in cosmetic and pharmaceutical preparations. Manufactured under cGMP certification for pharmaceutical-grade quality. Also offers Cholesterol HP (High Purity) for liposomal formulations.
notes: Pharmaceutical-grade cholesterol with cGMP certification ensures highest quality standards. Multiple grades available for different applications (pharma, cosmetic, nutritional). High Purity grade optimized for liposomal drug delivery and advanced cosmetic formulations.
